# Checking for Normality

### Making Function
```{r}
manualqqplot <- function(data) {
  #Feeds data input into x variable, standardizes and sorts
  x <- data
  x <- (x - mean(x))/sd(x)
  x <- sort(x)
  
  #Generates random sample from standard normal and sorts to match with input, and plots
  y <- rnorm(100, 0, 1)
  y <- sort(y)
  finaldata = data.frame(cbind(x,y))
 
  p <- finaldata %>%
    ggplot() + 
    geom_point(aes(x=x, y=y)) +
    ggtitle("Normal QQPlot") + 
    ylab("Normal Quantiles") + 
    xlab("Sample Quantiles")

  return(p)
}
```

### Testing t distribution
```{r}
#Generates data from t distribution to feed into function
data = rt(100,10)
manualqqplot(data)
```
